name: Spag-Bool
description:
HOW TO PLAY: 

Spam type to write as many spaghetti code lines as possible, respond correctly to the events to get a bonus time and score reward!

CONTROLS - Please do the TUTORIAL if you're unsure!

Write Lines: Spam type on your keyboard
Bugs: Type the correct prompt
        Backspace: Delete current prompt
Coffee: Click on the cup
Popup: Ctrl + C (Copy) -> Ctrl + V (Paste)


SPAG-BOOL

This game was created as part of a 1 week game jam, this was my first ever game jam and it was a great experience! :D

Check out the dev log video here: insert video link
